name: Gladiator Manager Tycoon
description:
My little indie hobby gamedev project is ready. there will be bugs! but hope some of you like the idea:) Have fun guys

Gladiator Manager Tycoon

Salve Dominus!
This is your Ludus. Train your gladiators and let them fight to the blood against other gladiators.
Each fight ill bring you fame and strength,
Get stronger defeat all arenas and repeat.
With fame you can buy upgrades in the fame shop so be honourful and die or defeat your enemy for fame.
The ludus is yours!
